name: Steal The Ride
description:
Simple top-down shooter with rouge-like elements and more advanced reload and shooting mechanics placed in the Wild West. You have to Steal The Ride by killing everyone that tries to stop you. Beware, there is someone waiting for you at the end and is really angry! Oh, and also your guns are not semi-automatic!

Made for CS (TGSK) project at Łódź University of Technology, FTIMS.
